START.name: Dimly lit room
START.desc: You wake up in an unfamiliar room. There is a door to your left, right, and behind you.

BROOM.name: Bloody Room
BROOM.desc: There is blood everywhere! It seems to be dripping from the ceiling and walls! There are no other doors. You should probably go back!

HROOM.name: Hanging room
HROOM.desc: There is a body hanging from a noose in the center of the room! There also doesn't seem to be a way out. You should go back!

BIROOM.name: Bright Room
BIROOM.desc: This room is well lit and disturbingly clean. There are doors to your left and right. You can always go back too.

BPROOM.name: Body Part Room
BPROOM.desc: You step in a puddle of blood and notice there are dismembered body parts all over the room. There is a door to your right or you could go back!

GROOM.name: Good Place
GROOM.desc: You made it! This is the good ending! Great job! Enjoy paradise!

DROOM.name: Dark Room
DROOM.desc: It's really hard to see in here, but you notice to your left there is a glowing door or you could always go back.

BAROOM.name: Bad Place
BAROOM.desc: You messed up kid! Welcome to the Bad place suffering and torture are all you have to look forward to now! Have fun! HAHAHAHA!
